fields.Title: WHIRLING F1 / HARDIE SCAN THE ROOM
fields.Description: * Tracks viscal in the hanged man's sequence allows you to connect these guys to the tracks on the crime scene.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Easy, fellas, we got company," Tit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Easy, fellas, we got company," Titus puts an end to it. "Let's see what brings the cop around."

fields.Title: Theo: "As you can see he doesn't speak a l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As you can see he doesn't speak a lot... and you almost missed him among the others.

fields.Title: You: "These bandits? Definitely."
fields.Dialogue Text: These bandits? Definitely.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""What are you talkin' about, madman..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What are you talkin' about, madman? There's no eighth Hardie boy. There's seven of us and we're all here." He sizes you up.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Shut the *fuck* up, Glen!" he roar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Shut the *fuck* up, Glen!" he roars. "I do the talking here! Now what the fuck do you want, cop?"

fields.Title: You: "One of them is missing. The Odd Sol..."
fields.Dialogue Text: One of them is missing. The Odd Sole?

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "Of the actors here. You could take..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Of the actors here. You could take another look at the tracks in the mud -- on the crime scene. Compare it to these guys.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Yes. Ruby the *lady driver drug run..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes. Ruby the *lady driver drug runner*. There's no denying it now. Time to ask the boys some questions...

fields.Title: Theo: "Sitting on his right: standard work..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Sitting on his right: standard working boots, size 45 or 46. Eldest in the room, probably mid-fifties. Smoker, quiet.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "... use it to take a dig at his fri..."
fields.Dialogue Text: ... use it to take a dig at his friend. Flood gates open.

fields.Title: Fat Angus: ""Yeah." The fat guy in the middle l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah." The fat guy in the middle lets out a little chuckle. "You're not even being fucked, Dennis."

fields.Title: Eugene: ""Relax, Dennis, no one is fucking y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Relax, Dennis, no one is fucking you yet," says the forty-something man from the corner, with a plectrum hanging from his neck.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Too late to stop you. You've alread..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Too late to stop you. You've already got them all -- including the old bearded man who's smart enough to smoke instead of talking.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Too late -- you already got a prett..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Too late -- you already got a pretty good picture of these guys. You can use this.

fields.Title: You: "A picture of what?"
fields.Dialogue Text: A picture of what?

fields.Title: Jump to: [Titus Hardie: ""What are you talkin' about, madman..."]
Logic: "It has to be good if he won't let y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It has to be good if he won't let you pursue it. Looks like the lieutenant thinks so too...

fields.Title: Alain: "Across, at the other table: hobnail..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Across, at the other table: hobnailed working boots, size 43. Gang tattoos. Mesque or Saramirizian. In his late thirties/early forties.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""No-no-no," Titus points at himself..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No-no-no," Titus points at himself, "Eyes here! You got business with my boys, you got business with me."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""So let me get this straight... the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So let me get this straight... there *is* an eighth Hardie boy, it's a *she* and you don't like us talking about her?"

fields.Title: You: "Ruby's missing, obviously."
fields.Dialogue Text: Ruby's missing, obviously.

fields.Title: Glen: ""Yeah, Dennis, calm down," a blond..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, Dennis, calm down," a blond man in his thirties agrees. "No one's fucking you, you stupid fuck."

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Exactly. You've stood there for abo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Exactly. You've stood there for about four seconds, not saying anything. Hit them with questions -- where's the eighth Hardie?

fields.Title: You: "Got it."
fields.Dialogue Text: Got it.

fields.Title: Fat Angus: "In the middle, heaving and wheezing..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In the middle, heaving and wheezing: big guy, boot size 46, deep marks. Probably carried the victim over. He alone is 130 kilos; add the man in armour and you could easily exceed 220.
fields.Alternate1: In the middle, heaving and wheezing: The fabled giant of Koko Nur, boot size 46, deep marks. Probably carried the victim over. He alone is 130 kilos; add the man in armour and you could easily exceed 220.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""The fuck is with you, fella?" Titu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The fuck is with you, fella?" Titus is staring at you with his head tilted.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Now watch the other guys fuck it up..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Now watch the other guys fuck it up by falling out of line.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Of course. When you get the time, y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Of course. When you get the time, you could take another look at those tracks in the yard. See if they fit this band of miscreants.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "You could take another look at the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You could take another look at the tracks in the yard, see if they fit with the characters here -- it could be incriminating.

fields.Title: You: "Not necessarily. The lady driver co..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Not necessarily. The lady driver could have kept the drug trade secret.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Or what -- *you* want to be the ei..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Or what -- *you* want to be the eighth Hardie boy? We ain't hiring!" He shakes his head.

fields.Title: Glen: "Starting from the right: Boot size..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Starting from the right: Boot size 44. Blond man in his thirties. Overbearingly masculine.

fields.Title: Endurance: "Coughs a lot."
fields.Dialogue Text: Coughs a lot.

fields.Title: You: "And the little guy?"
fields.Dialogue Text: And the little guy?

fields.Title: Shanky: ""Yeah, you fuck with the Hardie boy..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, you fuck with the Hardie boys, you fuck with Titus Hardie!" shouts the scrawny rat-faced man, two teeth missing in the front.

fields.Title: You: "The old bearded man?"
fields.Dialogue Text: The old bearded man?

fields.Title: Suggestion: "This one knows how to keep things g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This one knows how to keep things going. He's a hothead, but not one to be taken lightly. The last one is a bit of a black sheep...

fields.Title: Glen: ""Sorry, boss..." you hear the blond..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sorry, boss..." you hear the blond man almost whimper.

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "A symmetric burn on his neck, resem..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A symmetric burn on his neck, resembling the letters *Los Los*. Has he tried to burn it off, leave that life behind?

fields.Title: Logic: "He understood what you were trying..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He understood what you were trying to do. Taking inventory of them.

fields.Title: You: "Ignore it."
fields.Dialogue Text: Ignore it.

fields.Title: You: "Where?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Where?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good -- we're all watching each ot..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good -- we're all watching each other." The lieutenant adjusts his spectacles. "Officer, your question?"

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "Too late, you already scanned the r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Too late, you already scanned the room. You got a pretty good picture.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "He spent his youth in Villalobos, a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He spent his youth in Villalobos, a housing project in the Jamrock Quarter. There were incarcerations. Hard to say what else -- the ink is fading.

fields.Title: Drama: "Let's call this one The Musician."
fields.Dialogue Text: Let's call this one The Musician.

fields.Title: Shanky: ""Yeah, what brings you around, copp..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, what brings you around, copper?" the rat-faced sycophant repeats.

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "Good. You could take another look a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Good. You could take another look at the tracks in the yard -- on the crime scene. See if they fit this bunch.

fields.Title: You: "This would fit what Joyce told us,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This would fit what Joyce told us, but I don't want to make any assumptions.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Maybe. But hey, you've stood there..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Maybe. But hey, you've stood there for about four seconds, not saying anything. Now is a good time to hit them with questions -- where's the eighth Hardie?

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""You're not cops here. Don't go dig..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're not cops here. Don't go digging around, if you don't want a bullet in the back of your head. I'm watching you."

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Exactly. But none of this is news t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Exactly. But none of this is news to you. You've stood there for about four seconds, not saying anything -- time to move on...

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "In conclusion: these seven are the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In conclusion: these seven are the actors on the crime scene. The footprints were theirs, but there's a *discrepancy*.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Yes, falling out of line to *please..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes, falling out of line to *please* him! This is the best kind. And now this guy is going to...

fields.Title: You: "Got it."
fields.Dialogue Text: Got it.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "This person Glen wants to hire -- h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This person Glen wants to hire -- he really respects her.

fields.Title: Perception (Smell): "Awful smell. His feet stink from al..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Awful smell. His feet stink from all the way over there, despite having boots on.

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "The emblem on his vest says 'Rowing..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The emblem on his vest says 'Rowing club'. A little patch below it reads: 'T. Hardie, Captain'.

fields.Title: Shanky: ""Fuckin' say something already!" Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fuckin' say something already!" The rat-faced man doesn't let you think.

fields.Title: You: ""I found eight sets of footprints,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I found eight sets of footprints, but there's only seven of you... Where is the eighth Hardie boy?"

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Hmmm... *She*? So there is an eight..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Hmmm... *She*? So there is an eighth Hardie and it's a Hardie girl?

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""That's right, we're not talking ab..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's right, we're not talking about this. This is a private Hardie boys matter, nothing to do with your shit. *And*..." He points at the lieutenant.

fields.Title: Shanky: ""Fuckin' say something already!" Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fuckin' say something already!" The rat-faced man doesn't let you finish the thought.

fields.Title: You: "The entire Union might be involved...."
fields.Dialogue Text: The entire Union might be involved. Maybe even all of Martinaise... (Look around suspiciously.)

fields.Title: Alain: ""Let Dennis enjoy his fucking, man...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let Dennis enjoy his fucking, man. We don't mind." You notice gang tattoos; the man must be either Mesque or Saramirizian.

fields.Title: Glen: ""Actually, boss, we've been talking..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Actually, boss, we've been talking and we think she could maybe..."

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "*She*? So there is an eighth Hardie..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *She*? So there is an eighth Hardie and it's a Hardie girl? Who might it be, Elizabeth the gardener?

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "There's no point in pushing it furt..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's no point in pushing it further, he thinks. This is already a victory. We'll learn more about this eighth Hardie sooner or later.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: "And then -- standard working boot,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: And then -- standard working boot, steel reinforced toes, size 46. The big dick. Wide at the shoulders and lean at the hips. Rugby cap, fingerless gloves, and numerous scars, a little under forty.

fields.Title: Shanky: "Size 41, with the light step. Not a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Size 41, with the light step. Not a child after all -- an older man with a rat-face; mean watery eyes and two front teeth missing.

fields.Title: Composure: "Wants the world to know he's a mach..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wants the world to know he's a macho-macho man: tobacco-chewing and knuckle cracking. Who else do we have here?

fields.Title: You: "What can I use it for?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What can I use it for?

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Exactly, the missing lady driver wh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Exactly, the missing lady driver who was running the drug trade. Does it mean that the Hardie boys are involved in the drug trade as well?

fields.Title: Logic: "It has to be good if he won't let y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It has to be good if he won't let you pursue it.

fields.Title: Eugene: "On his neck. Forget it. It's not im..."
fields.Dialogue Text: On his neck. Forget it. It's not important.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "That's enough to take another look..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's enough to take another look at those tracks in the yard. See if they fit this band of miscreants.

fields.Title: You: "One of them is absent. The Odd Sole..."
fields.Dialogue Text: One of them is absent. The Odd Sole?

fields.Title: Eugene: "In the far corner: standard working..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In the far corner: standard working boot, steel reinforced toes, size 44. Forty-something, non-alcoholic beverage in hand. (You squint.) Is that a *plectrum*?

fields.Title: Shanky: ""Fuckin' say something already!" Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fuckin' say something already!" The rat-faced man doesn't let you think.
